AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT
VALUER Type: VALUERSDescription: Environmental Services

description: Installation of a new sculpture, commissioned as part of Kingston's Sculpture Trail. The sculpture is a bronze cast of a goat on a steel base
decision_conditions: The works hereby permitted shall begin before the expiration of three years from the date of this consent.Reason: This is required by Section 18 of the Planning (Listed Building and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 (as amended).

The development to which this permission relates shall be carried out in accordance with the materials specified on the approved plans, application form and Heritage Statement.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development, in accordance with policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS8, DM10 and DM12 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

Within two months of the installation of the sculpture hereby approved, any damage or deterioration to the granite paving upon which the sculpture is positioned shall be made good.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance of the area following installation of the sculpture in accordance with Policies DM10 and DM12 of the Kingston Core Strategy (2012) and the NPPF (2021).
